T02D2841:181b-0: @181b * // bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2841:181b-1: dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon zhabs kyi //
T02D2841:181b-2: cho ga ting 'dzin rgyal po yi //
T02D2841:181b-3: yongs dag zhing du rnam par shes //
T02D2841:181b-4: 'phro ba rdo rje'i skar mda' brtsam //
T02D2841:181b-5: shin tu yid dga' grub pas byin brlabs sam //
T02D2841:181b-6: lha mchog legs gnas ting 'dzin grub pa'i gzhi //
T02D2841:181b-7: yang na dur khrod chu bo shing gcig 'gram //
T02D2841:181b-8: skal ldan chags bral the tshom med par zhugs //
T02D2841:181b-9: rgya chen mchod sbyin re ba med yid dag pa dang //
T02D2841:181b-10: bcas la rgyal ba lha yi pho brang dga' ldan du //
T02D2841:181b-11: rtse gcig yid byed gang la chags pa'i gnas //
T02D2841:181b-12: me 'obs dong ltar mi dga' skyo ba drag bskyed bya //
T02D2841:181b-13: skyil krung rgyal po rdo rje'i mdud pa brtan pa la gnas la //
T02D2841:181b-14: spyi bo snying ga lte dbus ham dang h'um dang aam rim bzhin //
T02D2841:181b-15: dkar dang sngo dang dmar po 'od 'phro rtsa chen
T02D2841:181b-16: sbubs nang gzhug / pha ma sems dbyings lus rlung
T02D2841:181b-17: srog bsdus yi ge gsum la bsdu //
T02D2841:181b-18: skye med las skyes me yis rab bzhus rgyal sras 'od 'dzag sprul pa bskyod //
T02D2841:181b-19: lcags kyu zhags pa rdo rje rlung gis ham aam h'um gsum gcig gyur cing //
T02D2841:181b-20: ye shes 'od phyung dh'u t'i'i lam byung shin tu dmar gsal dag byas la //
T02D2841:181b-21: rje btsun phyag mthil pad dbus aa las 'od sbubs dmar po yang drang bya //
T02D2841:181b-22: de la rje btsun spyan ras gzigs nyid gdul bya'i
T02D2841:181b-23: don la gcig tu thugs rnam par brtse bas bdag
T02D2841:181b-24: gi ltos pa thams cad nye bar dor ba thugs
T02D2841:181b-25: bskyod pa ni / rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi
T02D2841:181b-26: tshe tshe'i dus byed pas nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jigs
T02D2841:181b-27: pas rab tu 'jigs par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02D2841:181b-28: kho bo'i thugs rje dang byin gyi rlabs kyis ci nas kyang /
T02D2841:181b-29: khyod ji ltar 'jigs pa med pa de ltar yang
T02D2841:181b-30: dag par skyob par 'gyur gyis thams cad kyi thams
T02D2841:182a-0: cad du rnam pa thams cad @182a * //
T02D2841:182a-1: 'khor ba'am ngan song du yang ba dang 'jigs par
T02D2841:182a-2: ma byed cig / rigs kyi bu che ge mo
T02D2841:182a-3: zhes bya ba khyod rjes su 'dzin pa'i lha ni
T02D2841:182a-4: nga yin no zhes gsungs pas dbugs phyung ste /
T02D2841:182a-6: skye ba drag po gnyis kyis gnas gnyis la mngon par dga' ba dang /
T02D2841:182a-7: gdung ba nyid dang lhag pa'i lha la gus pa
T02D2841:182a-8: mi bzad pas skyabs su gsol ba ni thabs yin
T02D2841:182a-9: no // de nas stobs ldan sprul pa'i dbus //
T02D2841:182a-10: legs bcug dh'u t'i'i dbus nas su //
T02D2841:182a-11: sbubs dag nas ni sran 'brum bzhin //
T02D2841:182a-12: mkhas pas rnam shes 'phro bar bya //
T02D2841:182a-13: tshangs dbang za dang 'gul dang 'phrig / dmigs pa rang dbang gyur nyid dang //
T02D2841:182a-14: gsol btab ngal bsos gdon mi za //
T02D2841:182a-15: brtan pa'i 'phro ba grub pa'i ltas //
